document.full_text: european union regulators raided several liner shipping companies on tuesday, including danish group a.p. moller-maersk , france's cma cgm and germany's hapag-lloyd, on suspicion of price fixing, the commission and those companies said.
document.title: eu watchdogs raid container shipping companies
lines_and_colors: european union regulators raided several liner shipping companies on tuesday, including danish group a.p. moller-maersk , france's cma cgm and germany's hapag-lloyd, on suspicion of price fixing, the commission and those companies said.
